metadata.description: ReFi Italia was incubated as part of the Local Node Beta Cohort in January 2024. Since its establishment in February 2022, ReFi Italia has made significant strides, supporting projects like Rifai Sicilia (https://twitter.com/RifaiSicilia) and many other initiatives related to ReFi across Italy.
